RelatedSentence: The worst rainfall in more than a century has flooded large swaths of Bosnia and Serbia , threatening Serbia 's main power plant and unleashing landslides that have swept away homes and unearthed landmines left over from the region 's war , along with warning signs pinpointing their locations .
